title: Where can I get an online degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all: I really believe in online education! Me, I personally learned a lot of things with the help of online courses. Secondly, distance learning / e-learning / online education (whatever you call it) lowers the hurdles to access to higher education for many people worldwide! Pros and Cons Online education will suit many people, but it definitely is not for everyone. These advantages and disadvantages of online courses should help you decide whether or not you want to go through such a university. Pros: • Affordable • Time-saving • Flexible schedule • Prepares you for work in a digital in the digital market • Gives you access to many courses that are not available at your local universities • Allows you to study without disruption, even if you have to travel a lot Cons: • Requires a lot of discipline • Reduced interaction with professionals • Reduced interaction with other students • Employers may not find your papers authentic  Online Business School I think there exist several programmes which offer online degrees such as a bachelor’s degree or a master’s degree. I know the programme of the Online Business School (OBS) in Coventry, UK, quite well. These days the question is better asked where can’t you earn an online university degree? There are a large number of schools that have been doing this for years. Many of these are primarily or exclusively online. There are an increasing number of schools that are offering online degrees that are traditional state or non-profit schools. Quality varies a great deal. My recommendation (my wife went there) is Fort Hayes State University in Kansas. They are a state school that has been doing online for a long time and do a pretty good job at it. Tuition is reasonable. They are not well known, which I have always appreciated since I worked at other schools.
